Detailed Description

CmdCopy class is the copy command stored in the command stack.

CmdCopy represents a single copy action on a scene, copy on a clipboard a node from the scene.

See also:
CmdCut, CmdPaste, CmdDelete

Definition at line 54 of file CmdCopy.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdCopy::CmdCopy ( const QModelIndex &  index,
SoNode *&  clipboard,
SceneModel *  model,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new copy command that represents the copy of the node located with index in the model to the clipborad.

If parent is not null, this command is appended to parent's child list and then owns this command.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdCopy::redo (  ) [virtual]

Applies a change to the clipboard. After redo() clipboard will contain the node located on the model as index

See also:
undo().

Definition at line 79 of file CmdCopy.cpp.

References m_pClipboard, and m_pNode.

void CmdCopy::undo (  ) [virtual]

Reverts clipboard contain. After undo() is called, the state of the clipboard will be the same as before redo() was called.

See also:
redo().
